definition: to major (in a field)/to study a specialty to obtain a higher degree
to attack/to accuse/to study
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
comma/phrase marked by pause

sentences.english: I am currently pursuing a PhD degree in Bioinformatics at the UofM.
sentences.chinese: 本人现在正在攻读生物信息学博士的学位。

sentences.english: He is reading electron physics at Qinghua University.
sentences.chinese: 他现在在清华大学攻读电子物理学。

sentences.english: She's presently working on her PhD.
sentences.chinese: 她目前在攻读哲学博士学位。

sentences.english: She is a pre-business major and wants to study accounting or actuarial science. She heard UW-Madison’s business school had a good reputation.
sentences.chinese: 她将要进入商学院，想要攻读会计或是精算。

sentences.english: She currently pursues her first year bachelor music degree in Haute Ecole de Musique de Genève.
sentences.chinese: 她现就读于日内瓦国立高等音乐学院，攻读学士学位。

sentences.english: Mr. Karras, a doctoral student in education at Ohio State.
sentences.chinese: 在俄亥俄州立大学攻读教育学博士的卡拉斯先生。

sentences.english: She is reading for a degree in physics in Beijing University.
sentences.chinese: 她现在正在北京大学攻读物理学位。

sentences.english: Leblanc spent some time working for his father, and later began studying law.
sentences.chinese: 勒布朗为父亲工作了一段时间，后来开始攻读法律。

sentences.english: Kaylin will be attending University of California, Davis in the fall to study environmental science.
sentences.chinese: 黄恺琳将就读于戴维斯加州大学攻读环境科学。

sentences.english: Last year I studied sociology and political science in school.
sentences.chinese: 去年，我在学校攻读了社会学和政治学课程。

sentences.english: Chen Xiadan is also studying at Harvard, for an MBA.
sentences.chinese: 陈晓丹也在哈佛上学，攻读MBA。

sentences.english: I study astronomy because I like to look at stars.
sentences.chinese: 我攻读天文学，因为我喜欢看星星。

sentences.english: I have decided to study gerontology at college.
sentences.chinese: 我已经决定大学要攻读老年病学。

sentences.english: Over there, I studied for my Master's, where I got a Master's in Electrical Aerospace Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 在那儿，我攻读了宇航电气工程硕士。

sentences.english: I wish to pursue an MBA degree and have contacted the Office of Admissions and Records.
sentences.chinese: 我打算攻读企管硕士学位，并已与注册处联系。

sentences.english: She is now contemplating a doctorate in clinical psychology.
sentences.chinese: 如今莉兹仍在哈佛大学攻读临床心理学博士课程。

definition: to pursue one's studies
master's degree
doctoral degree/PhD/same as Doctor of Philosophy 哲學博士學位|哲学博士学位
to pass an entrance exam/to be admitted to
bachelor's degree
to undertake advanced studies/to take a refresher course
PhD degree (Doctor of Philosophy)/also abbr. to 博士學位|博士学位
pinyin: zhe2 xue2 bo2 shi4 xue2 wei4

definition: master's degree/person who has a master's degree/learned person
to seek knowledge/to study/to attend college
Columbia University
pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2

definition: to do research/to carry out research
to major in
to pass entrance exam/to enter college after a competitive exam
graduate student/postgraduate student/research student
dual degree (academic)
Bachelor of Arts/B.A./BA/A.B./Artium Baccalaureus
